Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~david_dornseifer Could you attach a peer debug.

Action.author: david_dornseifer
Action.body: Added peer0 log output that shows the panic after it has been joined to a channel.

Action.author: david_dornseifer
Action.body: ~denyeart can you please let me know if I can support the bug fixing process any further?

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~david_dornseifer It looks like you have a key that is an empty string. This is not allowed in CouchDB. Go chaincode shim validates for this, but it looks like other shims do not. A fix can be made to validate against keys that are empty strings. In the interim the validation can be added to your chaincode logic.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Also backported to release-1.2 and release-1.3. All merged.
